title: Queensland election: Campbell Newman calls hung parliament 'recipe for chaos' â as it happened | Australia news | The Guardian
summary: campbell newman speaks at lnp fundraiser .
should tony abbott apologise to campbell newman ?

documents.title: day 23 of the queensland election campaign
text: as the day comes to an end let 's have a look back at what was have learned today : tony abbott conceded knighting prince philip had distracted from campbell newman 's re-election campaign but avoided saying directly if he would apologise .
premier campbell newman used his speech at a lnp fundraising lunch to flag public transport upgrades and attack labor for being in economic denial .
opposition leader , annastacia palaszczuk , announced a labor government would reinstate a program for school nurses and warded off questions she was avoiding the big issues , such as the economy .
labor will release their law and order policy tomorrow meaning we will finally know exactly what their stance is on the bikie laws .
so far they have just said they will repeal and replace them , but not what they will replace them with .
federal lnp mp george christensen was criticised for posting a cartoon de palaszczuk naked to his facebook page .
he deleted the post but called the criticism pathetic and unaustralian .
for a look at the six major issues of the campaign click here .
for a video of guardian australia journalists discussing and analysing the campaign visit here .
well , dear readers , that is the queensland live blog for today .
tonight newman flies out to the regions and palaszczuk has last been spotted north of brisbane .
do join us tomorrow where we will be talking tony fitzgerald 's 7.30 interview , ashgrove polling and labor 's costings .
labor seem to be using literally every federal figure they can in this campaign .
former treasurer , wayne swan , is appearing with annastacia palaszczuk , this afternoon .
katrina blowers ( @ katrinablowers ) qld labor brings in wayne swan to campaign in sandgate .
@ 7newsbrisbane # qldvotes
the head of queensland 's landmark corruption inquiry , tony fitzgerald , is sitting down with leigh sales tonight in an interview on 7.30 .
though he has given the media a lot of statements over the term of this queensland lnp government , it is rare for him to actually do an interview .
from abc 7.30 's teaser , it looks like fitzgerald will have more than a few choice words for the newman government .
abc730 ( @ abc730 ) corruption buster tony fitzgerald laments the state of qld governance in a rare i/v .
tonight # abc730 # qldpol
my colleague , daniel hurst , has written about campbell newman 's speech at the lnp fundraising lunch today .
campbell newman has flagged public transport upgrades and accused labor of economic denial in opposing privatisation as he made a pitch to voters not to risk a hung parliament .
you can read the full of the story here .
there is plenty of speculation about who is the leader of the lnp if campbell newman loses his seat , but what about the labor party ?
is annastacia palaszczuk 's leadership safe if the party remains in opposition ?
opposition frontbencher , jackie trad , was asked about leadership rumblings earlier today .
melanie stott ( @ mel stott ) south brisbane mp jackie trad says `` i have no ambitions '' for the labor leadership after # qldvotes polling day on sat .
there are a hell of a lot of suits in queensland at the moment - defamation suits .

campbell newman has launched a defamation suit against alan jones , who is not currently suing anyone , but has been offered financial help by clive palmer , who is not suing news corp any more but is still suing newman , who also faces a defamation suit from lawyers representing bikies .
got it ?
for further explanation i wrote about it here .
where in the world is queensland 's attorney-general , jarrod bleijie ?
brisbane times is asking after the once prominent senior lnp member seemingly disappeared into thin air .

after almost daily media appearances and becoming the face of the bikie laws , he has made one muted appearance on the trail and during the lnp campaign launch was not given a seat on stage during the lnp campaign launch .

bleijie was at the lnp fundraising lunch today and earlier gave bt a statement on how he 's spent his time during the campaign : [ i have been ] talking to people about the significant reductions in crime , red tape and workplace injuries this strong government has achieved in just a few short years .

i have also spoken to regional communities of the real risk of a hung parliament and the chaos that would unfold if the labor party flop over the line with the support of minor parties and independents on saturday .

some photos from the campaign trail this gloomy queensland day ( though i 'm sure somewhere in the state , undisturbed by a politician , the sun is shining ) a person dressed in a costume satirising queensland premier campbell newman collects money from taxpayers to complete dredging for the abbot point coal terminal expansion as part of a protest by green groups in brisbane on wednesday mckinnell/aapimage queensland premier campbell newman speaks at the lnp fundraising lunch in brisbane on wednesday .
pryke/aapimage opposition leader annastacia palaszczuk began wednesday morning in mackay walking with labor candidate julieanne gilbert .
paull/aapimage
the liberal national party only has to reveal the source of 40 % of its funding since it changed the donation declaration laws .
my colleague , nick evershed , found 60 % of the lnp funding did not have to be declared when he analysed lnp and labor donations here .
the lnp changed donor declaration laws when they won government so anything under $ 12,400 does not have to be declared .
previously any donation more than $ 1,000 had to be declared .
labor are not the upfront party they are painting themselves as though with 38 % of their funds not sourced properly , despite the party continuing to declare any donation more than $ 1,000 .
reporters not allowed to ask any questions after campbell newman 's speech at the fundraiser .
michael mckenna ( @ mckennaattheoz ) no press conference with premier tdy after stump speech at fundraiser .
questions get in way of message , strongly. # qldvotes

premier campbell newman has put law and order front and centre of his re-election pitch saying crime has dropped very , very significantly under the lnp government and credits the government 's bikie laws as contributing to this .

putting aside for a moment he is talking about petty crimes such as home break-ins and property theft when bikies are usually involved in more , ahem , lucrative crimes such as fraud and large scale drug dealing , is the premier telling the truth ?
he 's exaggerating , according to the abc 's latest fact check which you can read here .
crime rates are down , yes , but they have been following that trend for years .
i tend to watch the betting agencies more than the polls and am quite taken aback by the odds in ashgrove .
labor 's kate jones is a clear favourite over campbell newman .
the polls in the seat have been very close , with jones having a lead over newman , but the majority ( 60 % ) still believed newman would win the seat .
mark ludlow ( @ m ludlow ) sportsbet : $ $ flowing to kate jones in ashgrove in past few days ( $ 1.75 ) vs newman ( $ 2 ) .
state-wide lnp safe bet $ 1.10 , alp $ 6 .
# qldvotes
south australian senator , penny wong , is campaigning in brisbane for queensland labor .
she is with the state 's labor transport spokeswoman jackie trad .
a reporter says tony abbott says he has not been on queensland campaign trail because campbell newman wants to run his own race .
does that mean annastacia palaszczuk is incapable of running her own campaign ?
oh , come on !
wong responds .

i think anybody watching this campaign knows how well annastacia has been doing , and i think everybody knows that campbell newman is running away as far as he can from any mention of tony abbott and any mention of the cuts that mr abbott is imposing on queensland schools , hospitals , pensioners and families .

campbell newman finishes the speech speaking on the possibility of a hung parliament - there has been a lot of warnings about this result over the campaign , which really makes one wonder about the internal polling .
newman calls a hung parliament a real possibility and a recipe for chaos .
it will cost you , it will cost our state dearly .
only a strong and stable team with a strong plan to fund queensland 's future can deliver the jobs of tomorrow .
only a strong and stable teamcan deliver real cost-of-living relief for families .
only a strong and stable team can fund the better roads , schools and hospitals that our growing state needs .

this saturday i urge you to just vote 1 for the lnp , just vote 1 for a strong and stable government that will offer jobs , certainty and growth for our future , a government that can fund queensland 's future .
five strongs .
quite modest really .
daniel hurst ( @ danielhurstbne ) `` labor is a risk to queensland 's bright economic future , '' newman tells lnp fundraiser .
# qldvotes ping @ twitterid
campbell newman now talking about the only thing more familiar to a politician than a baby photo opportunity - the cost of living , a phrase which never seems to be defined .
does cost of living have to include air conditioners ?
more than one car per family ?
petrol for a four wheel drive rather than a hatchback ?
electricity bills are often brought up in cost of living debates but we never seem to talk about how many televisions are in the houses with the average bills .
so really , what exactly is the cost of living ?
because it mostly seems to be a debate about the bills of the middle class .
anyway , newman 's thoughts on it : only the lnp has a fully costed and fully funded plan to deliver real cost of living savings for families .

my vision is this , for queensland 's cost of living to be the envy of people from other states , and indeed other countries , since coming to office our team has been working tirelessly to provide real financial relief to families , right across queensland .

some announcements from the premier 's lunchtime speech : 20 new park and rides in brisbane , gold coast and sunshine coast $ 295m in level crossing upgrades funding for the second stage of the gold coast light rail
campbell newman is really taking the boot to labor in this speech at the fundraiser .
you can not use the same money to pay your mortgage and to buy your groceries .
labor tried this trick before , they did n't make the hard decisions and look where that got queensland .
billions of dollars in debt that each and every queenslander is still paying for .
did n't work then , and it will not work now .
labor will slide queensland back into deep debt just as it was under anna bligh and their failure to have a plan for new infrastructure is just plain negligent .
that 's what their opposition of our leasing plan is all about - economic denial .
if you really could - think about this - if you really could pay off debt with just dividends , labor would have done it three years ago .

documents.title: campbell newman speaks at lnp fundraiser
text: the premier is at a fundraiser in brisbane .

he is sticking to his campaign lines in this speech , mentioning resilient queenslanders at the beginning and then talking about what we have learned during the campaign : we 've learned that labor can not fund queensland 's future .

we 've learned that labor has got absolutely no plan to build the infrastructure , the schools , the hospital , the roads and bridges that our local mayors , the businesses , the chambers of commerce , the communities say are desperately needed .
we 've also learned that the minor parties are doing preference deals .
they 're swapping thevotes .
and that would deliver a hung parliament , that wouldhang queensland .
this isclearly undoubtedly a recipefor economic chaos and it wouldsadly hurt queenslanders .
campbell newman positions the decision to sell assets as a decision between raising taxes or cutting education , hospital and police funding or selling the assets .
ladies and gentlemen , we are the only team with a strong plan to fund queensland 's future .
together , ladies and gentlemen , our strong economic management with the hard work of queenslanders is delivering real progress .
we are creating more jobs , in a stronger economy .
the menu at the lnp fundraiser in queensland .
shane doherty ( @ shanedoherty9 ) strong plan , strong menu .
what your $ 250 lnp lunch looks like # qldvotes # 9news # qldpol

my colleague daniel hurst is at the lnp $ 250 a head fundraiser campbell newman is attending where a representative of the lnp event sponsor , capital [ b ] , just said to the audience at the end of his speech : let 's keep queensland strong and on saturday let the best man win .
i assume he thinks newman is a better man than annatacia palaszczuk .

hurst tells me former nationals premier rob borbidge is mcing and the federal colleagues in the audience are attorney-general george brandis , senator james mcgrath , brisbane mps teresa gambaro and jane prentice .

documents.title: annastacia palaszczuk press conference
text: it seems we will be getting labor 's bikie policy and costings tomorrow .
annastacia palaszczuk is being given a tough time at her press conference where she has announced labor will reinstate a school nursing program .
is this the most pressing issue confronting queensland ?
what about the economy ?
i 've spoken about the economy .
law and order will be out tomorrow , costings will be out tomorrow .
you have mad a lot of nursing announcements this election , how much is the nurses union playing a role in policy development ?
not at all .
is this as good as your ideas get ?
you ask the mums here today if they can put a value on their kids not getting tested .
what exactly are you going to do for the 14,000 public servants who were sacked ?
you need to talk to the premier about that.ï » ¿
annastacia palaszczuk is holding a press conference in logan , just south of brisbane , after returning from far north and central queensland .
she is campaigning on the school nurse program , which was axed by the lnp government , labor is promising to restore it .
this is a good labor announcement , it is about our young kids and making sure they get the best start in life .
campbell newman will arrive at a lnp fundraising lunch any moment now .

tony abbott has been a noticeable absence from the queensland campaign trail but there a few likenesses hanging around outside the fundraiser shane doherty ( @ shanedoherty9 ) never a tony abbott when you need him in the qld campaign .
then 2 turn up at once # qldvotes # qldpol # 9news
education minister , christopher pyne , is in canberra talking about the federal government 's proposed university reforms but he has also been asked about the queensland election .
he says he is not going to be a commentator .

they 've made the hard decisions for queensland , certainly in an economic sense that 's put queensland back on its feet after the hopeless governments of anna bligh and peter beattie but i 'm not going to be a commentator .
here we have a melbourne blow-in trying to play up to outdated , elitist and plain wrong southern perceptions that queensland is full of hicks .
deputy leader of the greens and federal melbourne mp , adam bandt , is in brisbane campaigning on daylight savings .
it 's a contentious issue in queensland , the only state on the east cost of australia not to change their clocks as summer comes on .

those in the densely populated southeast ( who are also close to the beach ) would like daylight savings to be brought in but the majority of queenslanders who live in the country and the north do not want it for a host of varied and complex reasons , mainly to do with farming and how hot it gets in parts of queensland .

to illustrate the greens campaign for daylight savings , bandt , is playing up to stupid stereotypes that queenslanders are so dumb they 're afraid their curtains will fade if daylight savings is introduced .
katherine feeney ( @ katherinefeeney ) .
@ adambandt holds up curtains to offset fears daylight savings has a negative impact on upholstery # qldvotes both major parties have ruled out introducing daylight savings next term .
more war tales from the premier 's seat of ashgrove where by all accounts the campaigns are getting quite tense and aggressive .
steve toomey , an ashgrove resident , wrote a letter to 1500 other locals arguing for the re-election of campbell newman as the local mp , the australian reports .
he did not identify himself as an lnp member in the letter , and he does not have to under queensland electoral laws .
he told the australian he now wishes he had never sent the letter .
i 've received feedback ; some of it 's been aggressive , some of it 's been threatening .
i 've been called a stooge ¦ i 've had letters saying i know where you live ' .
i sat down with my colleagues , daniel hurst and joshua robertson , to chat about who has had the strongest campaign and who is going to win on saturday night .
hurst very wisely refuses to predict who will win .
i do n't want to look stupid on sunday .
big props to fred mcconnell who put the video together .
bridie jabour , joshua robertson and daniel hurst discuss the election .

former victorian premier , jeff kennett , has chipped tony abbott saying he is damaging campbell newman 's campaign in the same way he damaged denis napthine 's during last year 's victorian state election , according to the australian .
the newspaper included the quotes from kennett in a story about newman criticising abbott for knighting prince philip .

kennett said the referral of industrial laws to the productivity commission had also hurt newman just as the federal government 's hike in the fuel excise weeks before the victorian election had damaged the liberal party in that state .
he [ abbott ] talks about team australia , what about team liberal ?
campbell is up there quite rightly trying to talk about the damage , the risk that will be done if a labor government is elected .
and he is being bucketed around by these other issues that are not of his making and are sadly happening all too frequently .
and when you have such simple issues such as the knighthood , everybody has a view on it .
queenslanders are being diverted from the things that campbell is focusing on , the things that matter . ''
my wizard colleague nick evershed built this data map of queensland .
you can see electorates according to wealth , unemployment and a range of other factors as well as fiddle with the size of them according to different demographics .
interactive queensland election map
back to the cartoon george christensen posted on facebook which de annastacia palaszczuk naked on a wrecking ball .
he has deleted the post but greens senator , larissa waters , says he should apologise too .
it 's appalling that george christensen firstly published this derogatory cartoon and then failed to apologise , instead suggesting it should be laughed off , she said in a statement .
sexism and archaic views on gender are not laughing matters they 're alarming insights into the views held by members of the lnp .
christensen has dismissed the criticism as unaustralian and pathetic in a post on his facebook page .
it 's pretty pathetic to fake outrage at a joke just to score political points .
it 's also unaustralian given taking the mickey ( especially out of politicians ) has always been a strong part of our national culture .
i just wish we would lighten up and have a laugh sometimes .
i fear as a nation we are losing our sense of humour to political correctness .
waters compared it to an email which went out to lnp supporters last week with the subject line do n't wake up with regrets and a photo of palaszczuk underneath .

here is he cartoon : bridie jabour ( @ bkjabour ) cartoon featuring @ twitterid which @ twitterid posted on his facebook page # qldvotes and the email : bridie jabour ( @ bkjabour ) subject line of latest lnp email to subscribers `` do n't wake up with regrets `` # qldvotes campbell newman says the cartoon had nothing to do with him and has endorsed the email saying queensland would regret electing a labor government .

documents.title: should tony abbott apologise to campbell newman ?
text: prime minister , tony abbott , has been asked if he will apologise to campbell newman for the uproar over the knighting of prince philip being a distraction to the queensland election campaign .
newman initially copped flak for refusing to address his thoughts on it and then yesterday said it was a bolt from the blue and he disagreed with the decision .

abbott on newman disagreeing : i absolutely respect campbell newman 's right to run his campaign and quite rightly and properly he has focused on running it in queensland i accept this has been a distraction over the past few days .
he does not say directly if he will apologise to newman .

i talk to campbell often , we 've been talking from time to time in the campaign he wants to focus on a strong team with a strong plan , i suspect it is the questioners that have stopped him from doing it .
questioners , i assume , is loose code for media .
premier campbell newman campaigning in bulimba may raise an eyebrow as it would be expected to be one of the first seats to swing away from the lnp in the expected natural correction .

interesting tidbit : the lnp mp for the seat , aaron dillaway , was initially pre-selected for ashgrove in late 2011 but stepped aside for newman to run in the seat , when he became the leader of the lnp from outside the parliament .
the premier is campaigning in the knife-edge marginal seat of bulimba in brisbane .
the lnp hold it by a sliver , just 0.1 % .
jamie mckinnell ( @ jamie86 ) .
@ theqldpremier visiting cannon hill train station with treasurer geoff egan ( @ geoffegan ) the lnp is spruiking more park and rides at the canon hill train station this morning .
# qldvotes # qldpol
here is today 's courier mail front page , known in brisbane and beyond for its , ah , creative approach to front pages .
christopher dore ( @ wrongdorey ) pm 's palace pleaser a party flop .
front page of the courier-mail .
# auspol
turning to the headlines of the morning : my colleagues and i have put together the six major issues of the queensland election which you can read here .
campbell newman yesterday released the lnp 's costings confirming its proposal to sell assets is funding its infrastructure projects .
my colleague daniel hurst has filed a very thorough look through the documents here .
we are yet to see labor 's costings .
brisbane times is reporting federal mp , george christensen , has published a crude cartoon of annastacia palaszczuk on his facebook page .
it features her naked on a wrecking ball and newman has said it has nothing to do with me .
brisbane 's newspaper , the courier mail , has focussed on the $ 1.3bn rabbit the lnp has pulled out of its hat with the release of the costings .
the cm reported newman hit the hustings in his electorate of ashgrove without media yesterday , and apparently tensions are rising between party volunteers at the pre-poll station .
both parties have called for interstate volunteers to man the crucial electorate , which newman hold with a margin of 5.7 % .
good morning queenslanders and queensland watchers alike .
this morning we greet you from overcast brisbane where the premier is beginning his day .
annastacia palaszczuk is in mackay and expected to make her way down the coast in an electorate blitz .
premier campbell newman is due at a $ 250 a head fundraising lunch in brisbane and then is expected to fly out to the regions .
we 'll hit the ground running with them .

key_events.text:
2.45am GMT
02:45
Campbell Newman speaks at LNP fundraiser

11.38pm GMT
23:38
Should Tony Abbott apologise to Campbell Newman?

bulletin.text: With just three days until the poll Campbell Newman and Annastacia Palaszczuk are touring the state. Follow the day's developments here.
